findSql.name: crmToSOMMigration.getAllDistinctOrderDataForBundleRunning
findSql.label: Get All Distinct OrderData For Bundle With Processes Running

method.name: cwOnFinderSQLSel
method.script: select distinct orderNumber , count_process_running, cworderid from STCW_VPNORDER_TO_MIGRATE where count_process_running > 0 and is_bundle = 1
